text:
Almost all of the MCU movies are available on Netflix, which actually competes against the movie channels. However, Disney is slated to come out with its own streaming app to watch all Disney content only on. This may impact the deal between Disney and Marvel which the latter now owns.

As of now, the MCU movies are on Netflix, but once this streaming app comes out, who knows what will happen.
title: Why hasn't Captain America: Civil War been on the movie channels HBO, Starz, or Showtime?
